content:
We are a start-up company working on an EMR data integration app that has been in development for 4 years now. We are still early but have clients.

We built our platform on Allscripts Unity, but want to port the app to SMART on FHIR and integrate with Epic and other FHIR-complaint EMRs. We are looking for someone with experience in FHIR (and hopefully Epic integration) who would take on this project in a part-time role and work with our small team as we complete an MVP. There is an opportunity to grow this into a full-time position if desired if the MVP is successful.

Contact gbwillner@bwpgprecisionmed.com
